messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

I understand. I will follow the steps below to find the maximum number of books:

1. Meet with Wim first.


Why: Wim has two salespersons reporting to him, Jing and Wei, who together have donated 56 + 22 = 78 books.

2. Meet with Raj next.


Why: Raj has two salespersons reporting to him, Nisha and Reza, who together have donated 10 + 50 = 60 books.

3. Meet with Amir last.


Why: Amir, as the CEO, has no salespersons reporting to him, so he will not have any books to donate. However, he may have other resources or information that could be useful.

Answer: Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, Reza

Now, you are told that through Amirâ€™s direct report Wim, it is possible to meet Wim and any of direct reports. Remember that you will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Starting from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

I understand. Based on the new information, I will follow the steps below to find the maximum number of books:

1. Meet with Wim first.

Why: Wim has two salespersons reporting to him, Jing and Wei, who together have donated 56 + 22 = 78 books. By meeting with Wim, I will have access to his two salespersons and their donations.

2. Meet with Jing next.

Why: Jing has donated 56 books, which is the highest number of books among all the salespersons. By meeting with Jing, I will have access to her donation of 56 books.

3. Meet with Amir last.

Why: Amir, as the CEO, has no salespersons reporting to him, so he will not have any books to donate. However, he may have other resources or information that could be useful.

Answer: Amir, Wim, Jing
